      • route

        public Blade route(String path,
                   Class<?> clazz,
                   String method)
        Add a route
        参数:
        path - route path
        target - Target object for routing
        method - The method name of the route (at the same time, the HttpMethod is specified: post:saveUser, if not specified, HttpMethod.ALL)
        返回:
        return blade

      • route

        public Blade route(String path,
                   Class<?> clazz,
                   String method,
                   HttpMethod httpMethod)
        Register a functional route
        参数:
        path - route url
        clazz - route processing class
        method - route processing method name
        httpMethod - HttpMethod Type, GET/POST/...
        返回:
        Blade return blade
